title: Recruiters trust humans more than algorithms
subtitle: Where automation breaks recruiter judgment: The Trust Gap

studySnapshot.whatItStudied: Recruiter trust in human vs algorithmic recommendations
studySnapshot.keyFinding: Recruiters punish algorithmic errors more harshly than human errors
studySnapshot.soWhatForResumes: Clarity is more important than keyword stuffing because humans are the final decision makers

keyInsights.title: The Trust Gap
keyInsights.explanation: Recruiters forgive human inconsistency but reject algorithms after a single error.
